𒃢 = 𒂷 GA 𒉺 PA capre كَبْش kabš כֶּבֶשׂ kéḇeś 𐤊𐤁𐤔 kbš “sheeps” SILA4

𒊩𒃢 female lamb #kir₁₁ capre

𒃢 GÁ × PA 𒉺 GAZI cheese 𒃢 𒃨 GÁ × SUM 𒋧 GAZI2 𒃨 ≈ 𒃢

𒂵 galac milk (liquid@cow) #šizbu
𒂵𒋩 GA.sur to milk
𒂵𒌙 gamur cheese (𒂵 galac milk)
𒂵𒄯 ga'ar cheese (𒂵 galac milk) ḫaMUR 𓏇
𒂵𒄯𒃢 ga.ar.zi a dairy product
𒂵𒃢 gazi cheese

𒂵𒃢 ⇔ goat
𒂵𒃢 ⇔ Ziege
